descriptionHTML:
Do you love basketball?! Then this watch face is for you!

Show your passion for sports with this basketball watch face.

The hour and minute hands are inspired by basketball tactics. The basketball circles around the field, acting as the second hand.

Features:

- Watch face for Android Wear Devices (Moto 360, G Watch R, Gear Live, SmartWatch 3, etc.)
- Support for both round and square displays
- Ambient mode

If you like the app, please leave a good rating!

In case you have any issues or suggestions, email us at support@zappup.nl
